net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.openal

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.openal.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to hold information for a Sound, as well as play the Sound.
    Since:
    May 9, 2013 at 7:54:33 PM, v0.2
    Version:
    May 9, 2013 at 7:54:33 PM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sound(java.lang.String location)
      Create a Sound instance at the specified location.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Dispose of the Buffers and data for the Sound instance.
      void loop()
      Loops the audio file indefinitely until it is stopped.
      void pause()
      Pause the Sound file's audio.
      void play()
      Play the Sound file's audio.
      void rewind()
      Rewind the Sound file's audio if paused.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      Set the volume of the sound.
      void stop()
      Stop playing the Sound file's audio if it is playing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sound

        public Sound(java.lang.String location)
      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Create a Sound instance at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the sound file to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown when the specified sound file could not be found.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Play the Sound file's audio.

      • loop

        public void loop()
        Loops the audio file indefinitely until it is stopped.

        public void pause()
        Pause the Sound file's audio.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop playing the Sound file's audio if it is playing.

      • rewind

        public void rewind()
        Rewind the Sound file's audio if paused.

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float volume)
        Set the volume of the sound. Value is from 0f-1f.
        Parameters:
        volume - The float value of the new volume.

        public void dispose()
        Dispose of the Buffers and data for the Sound instance.
